name: Brick Breaker 2D
description:
Brick Breaker 2D

In this game you will have to complete 24 challenging stages to finish the game.

You can always collect bonuses that can either help you or hurt you. 

So pay careful attention :)

The game's objective is to eliminate all of the BRICKS at the top of the screen by hitting them with the BALL. But, if the ball hits the bottom ENCLOSURE, the player loses and the game ends after loosing all lives! To win the game, all the BRICKS must be eliminated! 

Good Luck!
